title: Kutaisi Sport Museum
about: Kutaisi Sport Museum is located in Imereti, Kutaisi, at 3 Paliashvili Street. It was founded in 1970. The museum preserves more than 1600 exhibits. Here are photos and documentaries of famous athletes, books published on sports topics, sports equipment and various awards received at international tournaments of the Olympic Games, World Cup, Europe, Europe, Georgia - gold, silver, bronze medals, cups, whims, souvenirs. Kutaisi Sport Museum is quite attracting for people interested in this field. You can learn about the history of Georgian sports and the achievements of Georgian athletes here.
